template.name: 1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2
template.description:
Based on Zabbix 3.4 stock Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2
Template Interfaces version: 0.13 MIBs used: IF-MIB

discovery_rule.name: Descoberta de Interface de Rede
discovery_rule.description: Descobrindo as interfaces da IF-MIB. Interfaces com down(2) Status Administrativo não são descobertas.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes de entrada descartados
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O número de pacotes de entrada que foram escolhidos para serem descartados apesar de não terem sido detectados erros para evitar a entrega de um protocolo de camada superior. Uma possível razão para descartar esse pacote poderia ser liberar o espaço do buffer. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento, e em outros momentos conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes de entrada com erros
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB Para interfaces orientadas em pacotes, o número de pacotes de entrada que continham erros que os impediam de serem entregues a um protocolo de camada superior. Para interfaces orientadas a caracteres ou de comprimento fixo, o número de unidades de transmissão de entrada que continham erros impedindo que fossem entregues a um protocolo de camada superior. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento e, em outros momentos, conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes unicast de entrada
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O número de pacotes, fornecido por esta sub-camada a uma camada (sub) superior, que não foi direcionada a um multicast ou endereço de broadcast nesta sub-camada. Este objeto é uma versão de 64 bits do ifInUcastPkts. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento e, em outros momentos, conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bits recebidos
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O número total de octetos recebidos na interface, incluindo caracteres de enquadramento. Este objeto é uma versão de 64 bits do ifInOctets. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento e, em outros momentos, conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes de saída descartados
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O número de pacotes de saída que foram escolhidos para serem descartados apesar de não terem sido detectados erros para evitar a entrega de um protocolo de camada superior. Uma possível razão para descartar esse pacote poderia ser liberar o espaço do buffer. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento, e em outros momentos conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes de saída com erros
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB Para interfaces orientadas em pacotes, o número de pacotes de saída que continham erros que os impediam de serem entregues a um protocolo de camada superior. Para interfaces orientadas a caracteres ou de comprimento fixo, o número de unidades de transmissão de saída que continham erros que os impediam de serem entregues a um protocolo de camada superior. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento e, em outros momentos, conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes unicast de saída
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O número total de pacotes que os protocolos de nível superior solicitados são transmitidos e que não foram direcionados para um endereço multicast ou broadcast nesta sub-camada, incluindo aqueles que foram descartados ou não enviados. Este objeto é uma versão de 64 bits do ifOutUcastPkts. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento e, em outros momentos, conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bits enviados
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O número total de octetos recebidos na interface, incluindo caracteres de enquadramento. Este objeto é uma versão de 64 bits do ifInOctets. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento e, em outros momentos, conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Velocidade
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB Uma estimativa da largura de banda atual da interface em unidades de 1.000.000 bits por segundo. Se este objeto relatar um valor de `n ', a velocidade da interface está em algum lugar no intervalo de` n-500,000' a`n + 499,999 '. Para interfaces que não variam em largura de banda ou para aqueles onde nenhuma estimativa precisa pode ser feita, esse objeto deve conter a largura de banda nominal. Para uma sub-camada que não possui conceito de largura de banda, esse objeto deve ser zero.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Estado operacional
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O estado operacional atual da interface. - O estado de teste (3) indica que nenhuma verificação de pacotes operacional deve ser passada - Se ifAdminStatus estiver desativado (2), então ifOperStatus deve estar para baixo (2) - Se ifAdminStatus for alterado para cima (1), então ifOperStatus deve mudar para cima (1) se a interface estiver pronta para transmitir e receber tráfego de rede - Deve mudar todormant (5) se a interface estiver aguardando ações externas (como uma linha serial aguardando uma conexão entrante) - Deve permanecer no estado de baixo (2) se e somente se houver uma falha que o impede de ir para o estado de cima (1) - Ele deve permanecer no estado notPresent (6) se a interface tiver faltado (normalmente, hardware) componentes.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Tipo de interface
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O tipo de interface. Valores adicionais para ifType são atribuídos pela Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA), atualizando a sintaxe da convenção textual IANAifType.

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} or {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}-2 and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}-2
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Alta taxa de erro

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}<0 and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0 and ( {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=6 or {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=7 or {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=11 or {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=62 or {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=69 or {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=117 ) and ({1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>2)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}>0 and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].prev()}>0) or ({1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): {ITEM.VALUE1} Ethernet mudou para menor velocidade do que era antes
trigger_prototype.description: Último valor: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Essa conexão Ethernet caiu para a velocidade máxima conhecida. Isso pode ser um sinal de problemas de negociação automática. Ack para fechar.

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: ({1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0 and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=6
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): {ITEM.VALUE1} Uso de banda larga >{$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}%

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Advanced Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

template.name: 1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2
template.description:
Based on Zabbix 3.4 stock Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2
Template Net Mikrotik version: 0.13 MIBs used: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB MIKROTIK-MIB Known Issues: description : Doesn't have ifHighSpeed filled. fixed in more recent versions version : RotuerOS 6.28 or lower device : description : Doesn't have any temperature sensors version : RotuerOS 6.38.5 device : Mikrotik 941-2nD, Mikrotik 951G-2HnD

item.name: Temperatura
item.description: MIB: MIKROTIK-MIB (temperatura máxima) Temperatura do dispositivo em Celsius (graus C). Pode faltar nos modelos de entrada (RB750, RB450G ..) Referência: http://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/Manual:SNMP

item.name: Versão do firmware
item.description: MIB: MIKROTIK-MIB Versão atual do firmware

item.name: Número de série do hardware
item.description: MIB: MIKROTIK-MIB RouterBOARD número de série

item.name: Endereço MAC Principal
item.description: MIB: MIKROTIK-MIB MAC-Address Principal

item.name: Versão do software
item.description: MIB: MIKROTIK-MIB Software version

item.name: Utilização da memória
item.description: tilização de memória em %

item.name: Memória total
item.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB O tamanho do armazenamento representado por esta entrada, em unidades de hrStorageAllocationUnits. Este objeto é gravável para permitir a configuração remota do tamanho de a área de armazenagem nos casos em que tal A operação faz sentido e é possível no sistema subjacente. Por exemplo, a quantidade de A memória alocada a um pool de buffer pode ser modificada ou a quantidade de espaço em disco alocada à memória virtual pode ser modificado.

item.name: Memoria usada
item.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB O valor do armazenamento representado por esta entrada alocada, em unidades de Unidades de Alocação de Armazenamento.

item_prototype.name: Utilização da CPU {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB A média, em relação ao último minuto, da porcentagem de tempo que este processador não estava ocioso. As implementações podem se aproximar desse período de suavização de um minuto, se necessário.

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:system.cpu.util[hrProcessorLoad.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$CPU_UTIL_MAX}
trigger_prototype.name: Alta utilização da CPU {#SNMPINDEX}

discovery_rule.name: Descoberta de Temperatura da CPU
discovery_rule.description: MIKROTIK-MIB::mtxrHlProcessorTemperature Uma vez que a temperatura da CPU não está disponível em todo o hardware do Mikrotik, isso é feito para evitar itens não suportados.

item_prototype.name: Temperatura da CPU
item_prototype.description: MIB: MIKROTIK-MIB (mtxrHlProcessorTemperature) Processor temperature in Celsius (degrees C). Might be missing in entry models (RB750, RB450G..)

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:sensor.temp.value[mtxrHlProcessorTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_WARN:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.name: CPU: A temperatura está acima do limiar de aviso: {$TEMP_WARN:"CPU"}ºC
trigger_prototype.description: Último valor: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Este gatilho usa valores do sensor de temperatura, bem como o estado do sensor de temperatura, se disponível

dependency.name: CPU: A temperatura está acima do limite crítico: {$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}ºC
dependency.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:sensor.temp.value[mtxrHlProcessorTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:sensor.temp.value[mtxrHlProcessorTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.name: CPU: A temperatura está acima do limite crítico: {$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}ºC
trigger_prototype.description: Último valor: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Este gatilho usa valores do sensor de temperatura, bem como o estado do sensor de temperatura, se disponível

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:sensor.temp.value[mtxrHlProcessorTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.name: CPU: A temperatura é muito baixa: {$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"CPU"}ºC

discovery_rule.name: Descoberta de Armazenamento
discovery_rule.description: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB::hrStorage descoberta com filtro de armazenamento

item_prototype.name: Disco-{#SNMPINDEX}: Utilização de armazenamento
item_prototype.description: Utilização de armazenamento em % para Disco - {#SNMPINDEX}

item_prototype.name: Disco-{#SNMPINDEX}: Espaço total
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB O tamanho do armazenamento representado por esta entrada, em unidades de hrStorageAllocationUnits. Este objeto é gravável para permitir a configuração remota do tamanho de a área de armazenagem nos casos em que tal A operação faz sentido e é possível no sistema subjacente. Por exemplo, a quantidade de A memória alocada a um pool de buffer pode ser modificada ou a quantidade de espaço em disco alocada à memória virtual pode ser modificado.

item_prototype.name: Disco-{#SNMPINDEX}: Espaço utilizado
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB O valor do armazenamento representado por esta entrada alocada, em unidades de Unidades de Alocação de Armazenamento.

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:vfs.fs.pused[hrStorageSize.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$STORAGE_UTIL_WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: Disco-{#SNMPINDEX}: O espaço em disco é baixo

dependency.name: Disco-{#SNMPINDEX}: O espaço em disco é extremamente baixo
dependency.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:vfs.fs.pused[hrStorageSize.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$STORAGE_UTIL_CRIT}

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:vfs.fs.pused[hrStorageSize.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$STORAGE_UTIL_CRIT}
trigger_prototype.name: Disco-{#SNMPINDEX}: O espaço em disco é extremamente baixo

template.name: 1 - Template Module EtherLike-MIB SNMPv1
template.description: Template EtherLike-MIB (duplex control only) version: 0.14 MIBs used: EtherLike-MIB

discovery_rule.name: EtherLike-MIB Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovering interfaces from IF-MIB and EtherLike-MIB. Interfaces with up(1) Operational Status are discovered.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Duplex status
item_prototype.description:
MIB: EtherLike-MIB The current mode of operation of the MAC entity. 'unknown' indicates that the current duplex mode could not be determined.
Management control of the duplex mode is accomplished through the MAU MIB. When an interface does not support autonegotiation, or when autonegotiation is not enabled, the duplex mode is controlled using ifMauDefaultType. When autonegotiation is supported and enabled, duplex mode is controlled using ifMauAutoNegAdvertisedBits. In either case, the currently operating duplex mode is reflected both in this object and in ifMauType.
Note that this object provides redundant information with ifMauType. Normally, redundant objects are discouraged. However, in this instance, it allows a management application to determine the duplex status of an interface without having to know every possible value of ifMauType. This was felt to be sufficiently valuable to justify the redundancy. Reference: [IEEE 802.3 Std.], 30.3.1.1.32,aDuplexStatus.

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Template Module EtherLike-MIB SNMPv1:net.if.duplex[dot3StatsDuplexStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): In half-duplex mode
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check autonegotiation settings and cabling

template.name: 1 - Template Module EtherLike-MIB SNMPv2
template.description: Template EtherLike-MIB (duplex control only) version: 0.12 MIBs used: EtherLike-MIB

discovery_rule.name: EtherLike-MIB Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Descobrindo interfaces de IF-MIB e EtherLike-MIB. Interfaces com Up (1) Status operacional são descobertas.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Duplex status
item_prototype.description:
MIB: EtherLike-MIB The current mode of operation of the MAC entity. 'unknown' indicates that the current duplex mode could not be determined.
Management control of the duplex mode is accomplished through the MAU MIB. When an interface does not support autonegotiation, or when autonegotiation is not enabled, the duplex mode is controlled using ifMauDefaultType. When autonegotiation is supported and enabled, duplex mode is controlled using ifMauAutoNegAdvertisedBits. In either case, the currently operating duplex mode is reflected both in this object and in ifMauType.
Note that this object provides redundant information with ifMauType. Normally, redundant objects are discouraged. However, in this instance, it allows a management application to determine the duplex status of an interface without having to know every possible value of ifMauType. This was felt to be sufficiently valuable to justify the redundancy. Reference: [IEEE 802.3 Std.], 30.3.1.1.32,aDuplexStatus.

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Template Module EtherLike-MIB SNMPv2:net.if.duplex[dot3StatsDuplexStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): In half-duplex mode
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check autonegotiation settings and cabling

template.name: 1 - Template Module Generic SNMPv1
template.description: Template Module Generic version: 0.12 MIBs used: SNMPv2-MIB

item.name: SNMP traps (fallback)
item.description: Item is used to collect all SNMP traps unmatched by other snmptrap items

item.name: Detalhes do contato do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Descrição do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Localização do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Nome do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: Tempo de atividade do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

template.name: 1 - Template Module Generic SNMPv2
template.description: Template Module Generic version: 0.12 MIBs used: SNMPv2-MIB

item.name: SNMP traps (fallback)
item.description: Item is used to collect all SNMP traps unmatched by other snmptrap items

item.name: Detalhes do contato do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Descrição do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Localização do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Nome do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: Tempo de atividade do dispositivo
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

template.name: 1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1
template.description: Template Interfaces Simple (no ifXTable) version: 0.12 MIBs used: IF-MIB

discovery_rule.name: Descoberta de interfaces de rede
discovery_rule.description: Discovering interfaces from IF-MIB. Interfaces with down(2) Administrative Status are not discovered.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Pacotes de entrada descartados
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of inbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Pacotes de entrada com erros
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Bits recebido
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets received on the interface,including framing characters. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occurat re-initialization of the management system, and atother times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Pacotes de saída descartados
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of outbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Pacotes de saída com erros
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Bits enviado
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occurat re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Velocidade
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB An estimate of the interface's current bandwidth in bits per second. For interfaces which do not vary in bandwidth or for those where no accurate estimation can be made, this object should contain the nominal bandwidth. If the bandwidth of the interface is greater than the maximum value reportable by this object then this object should report its maximum value (4,294,967,295) and ifHighSpeed must be used to report the interace's speed. For a sub-layer which has no concept of bandwidth, this object should be zero.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Status Operacional
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The current operational state of the interface. - The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packet scan be passed - If ifAdminStatus is down(2) then ifOperStatus should be down(2) - If ifAdminStatus is changed to up(1) then ifOperStatus should change to up(1) if the interface is ready to transmit and receive network traffic - It should change todormant(5) if the interface is waiting for external actions (such as a serial line waiting for an incoming connection) - It should remain in the down(2) state if and only if there is a fault that prevents it from going to the up(1) state - It should remain in the notPresent(6) state if the interface has missing(typically, hardware) components.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Tipo de interface
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The type of interface. Additional values for ifType are assigned by the Internet Assigned NumbersAuthority (IANA), through updating the syntax of the IANAifType textual convention.

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} or {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}-2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}-2
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Alta taxa de erro

dependency.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}<0 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0 and ( {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=6 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=7 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=11 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=62 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=69 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=117 ) and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>2)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}>0 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].prev()}>0) or ({1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Ethernet mudou para menor velocidade do que era antes
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This Ethernet connection has transitioned down from its known maximum speed. This might be a sign of autonegotiation issues. Ack to close.

dependency.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Link down

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.in[ifInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.out[ifOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.in[ifInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.out[ifOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Uso de largura de banda alta

dependency.name: Interface {#IFDESCR}: Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv1:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

template.name: 1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2
template.description: Template Interfaces version: 0.12 MIBs used: IF-MIB

discovery_rule.name: Descoberta de interfaces de rede
discovery_rule.description: Discovering interfaces from IF-MIB. Interfaces with down(2) Administrative Status are not discovered.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes de entrada descartados
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of inbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes de entrada com erros
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bits recebidos
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O número total de octetos recebidos na interface, incluindo caracteres de enquadramento. Este objeto é uma versão de 64 bits do ifInOctets. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento e, em outros momentos, conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes de saída descartados
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of outbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Pacotes de saída com erros
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bits enviados
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB O número total de octetos transmitidos fora da interface, incluindo caracteres de enquadramento. Este objeto é uma versão de 64 bits do IfOutOctets. As descontinuidades no valor desse contador podem ocorrer na reinicialização do sistema de gerenciamento e em outros momentos, conforme indicado pelo valor de ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Velocidade
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB An estimate of the interface's current bandwidth in units of 1,000,000 bits per second. If this object reports a value of `n' then the speed of the interface is somewhere in the range of `n-500,000' to`n+499,999'. For interfaces which do not vary in bandwidth or for those where no accurate estimation can be made, this object should contain the nominal bandwidth. For a sub-layer which has no concept of bandwidth, this object should be zero.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Status Operacional
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The current operational state of the interface. - The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packet scan be passed - If ifAdminStatus is down(2) then ifOperStatus should be down(2) - If ifAdminStatus is changed to up(1) then ifOperStatus should change to up(1) if the interface is ready to transmit and receive network traffic - It should change todormant(5) if the interface is waiting for external actions (such as a serial line waiting for an incoming connection) - It should remain in the down(2) state if and only if there is a fault that prevents it from going to the up(1) state - It should remain in the notPresent(6) state if the interface has missing(typically, hardware) components.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Tipo de interface
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The type of interface. Additional values for ifType are assigned by the Internet Assigned NumbersAuthority (IANA), through updating the syntax of the IANAifType textual convention.

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} or {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}-2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}-2
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Alta taxa de erro

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}<0 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0 and ( {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=6 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=7 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=11 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=62 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=69 or {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=117 ) and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>2)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}>0 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].prev()}>0) or ({1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Ethernet mudou para menor velocidade do que era antes
trigger_prototype.description: Último Valor: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Essa conexão Ethernet caiu para a velocidade máxima conhecida. Isso pode ser um sinal de problemas de auto negociação. Ack para fechar.

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down

trigger_prototype.expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Uso de largura de banda alta

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {1 - Template Module Interfaces SNMPv2:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

template.name: 1 - Template Net Ubiquiti AirOS SNMPv1
template.description: Template Net Ubiquiti AirOS version: 0.12 MIBs used: FROGFOOT-RESOURCES-MIB IEEE802dot11-MIB Known Issues: description : UBNT unifi reports speed: like IF-MIB::ifSpeed.1 = Gauge32: 4294967295 for all interfaces version : Firmware: BZ.ar7240.v3.7.51.6230.170322.1513 device : UBNT UAP-LRdescription : UBNT AirMax(NanoStation, NanoBridge etc) reports ifSpeed: as 0 for VLAN and wireless(ath0) interfaces version : Firmware: XW.ar934x.v5.6-beta4.22359.140521.1836 device : NanoStation M5description : UBNT AirMax(NanoStation, NanoBridge etc) reports always return ifType: as ethernet(6) even for wifi,vlans and other types version : Firmware: XW.ar934x.v5.6-beta4.22359.140521.1836 device : NanoStation M5description : ifXTable is not provided in IF-MIB. So Interfaces Simple Template is used instead version : all above device : NanoStation, UAP-LR

trigger.expression: {1 - Template Wireless Net Ubiquiti AirOS SNMPv1:ubntWlStatStaCount.min(10)}=0
trigger.name: Não possui clientes conectados.

trigger.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: O dispositivo foi substituído (novo número de série recebido)
trigger.description: Último valor: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. O número de série do dispositivo mudou. Voltar para fechar

trigger.expression: {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {1 - Advanced Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: O firmware mudou
trigger.description: Último valor: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. A versão do firmware mudou. Voltar para fechar

trigger.expression: {1 - Template Net Ubiquiti AirOS SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {1 - Template Net Ubiquiti AirOS SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: O firmware mudou
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {1 - Template Net Ubiquiti TOUGH Switch SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {1 - Template Net Ubiquiti TOUGH Switch SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: O firmware mudou
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

dependency.name: Alta perda ICMP
dependency.expression: {1 - Template Module WEB ICMP Ping:icmppingloss.min(5m)}>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and {1 - Template Module WEB ICMP Ping:icmppingloss.min(5m)}<100

dependency.name: Não disponível via ICMP
dependency.expression: {1 - Template Module WEB ICMP Ping:icmpping.max(#3)}=0

dependency.name: Alta perda ICMP: {ITEM.VALUE1}
dependency.expression: {1 - Template Module ICMP Ping:icmppingloss.min(5m)}>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and {1 - Template Module ICMP Ping:icmppingloss.min(5m)}<100

dependency.name: Não disponível via ICMP
dependency.expression: {1 - Template Module ICMP Ping:icmpping.max(#3)}=0

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} foi reiniciado
trigger.description: Último Valor: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. O tempo de atividade do dispositivo é inferior a 10 minutos

dependency.name: Não há coleta de dados SNMP
dependency.expression: {1 - Template Module Generic SNMPv1:zabbix[host,snmp,available].max({$SNMP_TIMEOUT})}=0

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} foi reiniciado
trigger.description: Último Valor: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. O tempo de atividade do dispositivo é inferior a 5 minutos

dependency.name: Não há coleta de dados SNMP
dependency.expression: {1 - Template Module Generic SNMPv2:zabbix[host,snmp,available].max({$SNMP_TIMEOUT})}=0

item.host: 1 - Template Net Ubiquiti TOUGH Switch SNMPv1
1 - Template Net Ubiquiti TOUGH Switch SNMPv1
